<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Virtue-Forged Tattoos](/Feats.aspx?ID=956) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Ornate Tattoo](/Feats.aspx?ID=951)

</column>

---

Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin. Choose a 3rd-level [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell from the same school as your Arcane Tattoos, either a common spell or another to which you have access, including a lower-level spell heightened to 3rd level if you wish. You can cast that spell once per day as an innate arcane spell.
name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
